review: Arrived on time and very pleased with this product!
author: Andrew Barrios

review: I love the Google Chromecast. Use it in all TVs I have at home.
author: Wilson F. Raposo Prata

review: Love, Love, Love it... My TV can be off and from my Ipad I have totally control. when I choose Cast Tv turns on and I don't need the remote.  Sometimes the volume still isn't a loud from the ipad or app controls but other than that I have no gripes. Will buy another!
author: Kevin and Barbara

review: Fantastic, casting you screen is as easy as 1 2 3Turn any tv with an HDMI into a monitor for your phone or PC. Stream netflix, play angry birds in your 50" tv, watch youtube cat videos, even has some business application. Fantastic value I have one in every tv now.
author: Gunner Dearborn

review: I have a smart tv and Blu-ray player, so I bought this for streaming other things, but it will stop steaming once in awhile for no reason and I have to restart it.
author: Jason M. Snow

review: love this item, thanks for the great purchase.
author: Kathy H.
